ygData.subject: Re: single spectre in Feerott
ygData.msgSnippet: Which, in your opinion, are the best guards to do, Xurtin?  I have tried the DE ones near Neriak, but they spawn at different strengths, and have a high magic
ygData.messageBody:
Which, in your opinion, are the best guards to do, Xurtin? I have tried the
DE ones near Neriak, but they spawn at different strengths, and have a high
magic resistance.


----- Original Message -----
From: <SPRUSBRUCE@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, January 17, 2000 10:59 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] single spectre in Feerott


> From: SPRUSBRUCE@...
>
> its easy to get to But I fell its not that good xp cause hes a slow spawn
> always camped and quick kill. Therfore you kill him with half mana,
Little
> xp, And you have to wait 7 mintues for him to spawn again. Sometimes if
> you find a group of 4 you can pull from cave and tis great. Your better
off
> doing gaurds or soemthing imo.
>
> Xurtin Shadowreaver
